sentences.sContent: ...An investigation found that many of the super-rich were baffled by the infinite choices their money made available...
...He found that many of his subjects were confused by the infinite options their money presented them with...
...Twitter's huge success is rooted in the simple but profound insight that in a medium with infinite space for self-expression...
...Europe has fallen prey to a different ideological trap: the belief that European governments would always have infinite resources and could continue borrowing as if there were no tomorrow...

synos.tran: 无限的，[数]无穷的；无数的；极大的
无限；[数]无穷大；无限的东西（如空间，时间）

phrases.pCn: 无限大容量母线；无限汇流排

remMethod.val: in(无) ＋ fin(结束) ＋ ite(…的) → 没有结尾的 → 无限的

words.tran: 无穷小的；无限小的；极小的

trans.tranOther: without limits in space or time
